title: RecipeManager[配方管理]的熔炉配方
author: 寡人无能
txt_content:
插件版本2.18.1
服务器核心版本1.12.2
怎么设置熔炉配方，配置依旧是在plugins\RecipeManager\recipes
但是就是不成功，单独合成台成功了，熔炉不行！
请问有大佬能解答一下么，最好直接给个配方，我自行修改！


我的配置：
daocao 稻草变钻石
wheat % 20 - 30
& stone
= 50% diamond
下方的报错

[RecipeManager] File: RongoLu
line 2    Warning: Unexpected directive: 'wheat % 20 - 30'
          TIP: This might be caused by previous errors.
line 3    Fatal: Recipe was not added! Review previous errors and fix them.
          TIP: Warnings do not prevent recipe creation but they should be fixed as well!
line 4    Warning: Unexpected directive: '= 50% diamond'
          TIP: This might be caused by previous errors.
line 5    Fatal: Recipe was not added! Review previous errors and fix them.
          TIP: Warnings do not prevent recipe creation but they should be fixed as well!

replies.author: 寡人无能
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 寡人无能 于 2020-1-21 20:43 编辑 

已经自行解答，原因：修改熔炉配置需要重启客户端，reload 仅支持合成台重载不支持熔炉

请版主帮忙删帖
